TextJPN: 靴を履き、つま先を蹴りながら出てきた俺に、魅音がおずおずとやってくる。
TextENG: I put on my shoes, tapped my toes against the floor a few times, then left—and Mion timidly came over.

TextJPN: …何を今さら、こいつは赤くなっているんだか…。
TextENG: ...Why is she turning all red at a time like this...?

TextJPN: 「腕、……組んでもいいかな」
TextENG: ``Can I... hold your arm?``

TextJPN: ……………それはあまりに慎ましやかな要求だった。
TextENG: ............It was such a modest request.

TextJPN: 「…別に構わないぞ」
TextENG: ``...I don't mind.``

TextJPN: ……俺の許可が出ると、まるで玩具を買ってもらえた子供のようなほくほく顔で、俺の腕を取った。
TextENG: ...With my permission, her face lit up with glee, like a child being given a toy, and took my arm.

TextJPN: 「……私に腕を組まれたら、…何だか緊張しちゃわない？@k@vS02/03/130300502.　たとえば、急に関節技を極められちゃうんじゃないかな…なんて思ったりとか…」
TextENG: ``...Do you get kind of nervous... with your arm through mine?@k@vS02/03/130300502. You're not thinking for example... that I'd suddenly put you in a world-class joint lock, or anything...?``

TextJPN: 「…姉妹そろって同じことを言うんだな。@k@vS02/01/130101067.思わないよ。@k@vS02/01/130101068.全然」
TextENG: ``...You two say the same things.@k@vS02/01/130101067. I don't think that.@k@vS02/01/130101068. At all.``

TextJPN: まだ、…何も狂いださなかった頃。
TextENG: Back when... nothing had gone wrong yet.

TextJPN: …エンジェルモートでの賑やかな大騒ぎが懐かしいあの日々。
TextENG: ...During those nostalgic days of the bustling commotion at Angel Mort.

TextJPN: ……指を折って愕然とする。@kそれは、なんとたった１週間前のことだったからだ。
TextENG: ...I counted back, and was amazed.@k It had only been one week ago.

TextJPN: あの時もこうして、詩音と腕を組んだ。
TextENG: I had been arm in arm with Shion then, too.

TextJPN: こうして魅音とも腕を組んでいると、……本当に双子なんだなと実感する。
TextENG: Linking arms with Mion like this...... really reminded me that they were twins.

TextJPN: …力加減や、腕の感触、…温かさや、血の流れる…生きた感触が、まったく同じであることがよくわかった。
TextENG: ...How much strength they put into it, the sensation of their arms... their warmth, and the blood flowing... I could feel that their living sensations were all exactly the same.

TextJPN: 「…………………詩音も圭ちゃんのことが好きだったみたい」
TextENG: ``............I think Shion liked you, Kei-chan.``

TextJPN: 「……そうなんだ」
これが平常な会話だったら、…赤面して飛びのいたのかもしれない。
TextENG: If this were a regular conversation... I might have jumped back, red in the face.

TextJPN: でも今は、…何を聞かされても心は穏やかなままだった。
TextENG: Right now, though... no matter what I heard, my mind remained at peace.

TextJPN: 「……魅音と詩音は、…仲はよかったんだろ…？」
TextENG: ``...Mion and Shion... you got along well, didn't you...?``

TextJPN: 「さぁ、…………どうかな。@k@vS02/03/130300505.…圭ちゃんは、自分の右手と左手は仲が良いと思う？」
TextENG: ``Well......... I wonder.@k@vS02/03/130300505. ...Kei-chan, do you think your right hand and left hand get along?``

TextJPN: 「え？@k@vS02/01/130101072.　右手と左手？@k@vS02/01/130101073.　…それは仲がいいとか悪いとか、そういう言い方でたとえるものじゃないなぁ…」
TextENG: ``Huh?@k@vS02/01/130101072. My right hand and left hand?@k@vS02/01/130101073. ...I don't think you could describe them as getting along or not...``

TextJPN: 「そういう関係だから。@k@vS02/03/130300507.仲が良いとか悪いとか、そういう尺度では測れない関係」
TextENG: ``That's how our relationship is.@k@vS02/03/130300507. You can't measure it by the scale of how well we get along.``

TextJPN: ……それはとても仲が良い、という意味だけではないように聞こえた。
TextENG: ...That didn't sound like it meant they got along really well.

TextJPN: 「たとえば利き腕というものがあるように、右手と左手には間違いなく優劣の違いがある」
TextENG: ``For example, one of your hands is dominant, so there will always be a better hand.``

TextJPN: 「……もしも鍋掴みが片方しかなかったら、迷うことなく利き腕にするでしょ？@k@vS02/03/130300510.　そういう差はあったんじゃないかと思う」
TextENG: ``...If you only had one oven mitt, you would put it on your dominant hand without thinking, right?@k@vS02/03/130300510. I think maybe it was like that for us.``

TextJPN: 「だからと言って、左手がなくなったっていいなんて思う人は誰もいないはず。@k@vS02/03/130300512.……そんな、よくわからない関係だね」
TextENG: ``That doesn't mean, though, that anyone would be okay with losing their left hand.@k@vS02/03/130300512. ...It's that kind of unexplainable relationship.``

TextJPN: 「………多分、…それは近くに居過ぎるから見えなくなっているだけで…。@k@vS02/01/130101076.…きっととても仲のいいことなんだと思う」
TextENG: ``......I think that maybe... you lived too close together, and just stopped being able to see it.@k@vS02/01/130101076. ...But I think that means you get along really well.``

TextJPN: 「……俺は一人っ子だから、…祭りの前日。@k@vS02/01/130101078.魅音と詩音が二人してじゃれ合っているのを、すごく羨ましいと思った」
TextENG: ``...I'm an only child, so... the day before the festival...@k@vS02/01/130101078. I was really jealous of when you and Shion were messing around with each other.``

TextJPN: 「…………………ないものねだりじゃないの？@k@vS02/03/130300514.　双子なんて、昔は人をからかったりしてそこそこに面白かったけど。@k@vS02/03/130300515.…こうして互いがはっきりと異なる個性を持った今では、かえって邪魔なだけ」
TextENG: ``......I think you're jealous of something that doesn't exist.@k@vS02/03/130300514. Yes, we twins used to have a lot of fun playing tricks on people...@k@vS02/03/130300515. But now that we have such distinctly different personalities, it just gets in the way.``

TextJPN: 呪っているのか、照れているのか。@k…傍目にはわかりにくい姉妹の仲だった。
TextENG: Were they cursed, or were they self-conscious?@k ...Their relationship was hard to understand for an outsider.

TextJPN: それは俺如きが立ち入るべき問題ではないのかもしれない。
TextENG: Maybe that wasn't an issue someone like me should intrude on.

TextJPN: …ただ黙って、やさしく頷くのが一番の相槌なのだ。
TextENG: ...Just staying silent and nodding gently was the best way to advance the conversation.

TextJPN: 魅音は広い庭を通り抜け、…来る途中に見た、大きな荒れ果てた森へと俺を誘っていく。
TextENG: Mion passed through the wide yard... and invited me into the big, desolate forest we'd seen on the way in.

TextJPN: …こんな大きな森も敷地の一部なのだから…恐れ入る。
TextENG: ...Such a big forest was part of their property... so I couldn't help but feel small.

TextJPN: 「…………でかい森だな。@k@vS02/01/130101080.子供の頃はいい遊び場だったんじゃないのか？」
TextENG: ``............It's huge.@k@vS02/01/130101080. You must have had a great time playing in it as kids, huh?``

TextJPN: 魅音は無言で、記憶を辿っているようだった。
TextENG: Mion seemed to be silently reminiscing.

TextJPN: ……俺にそれをうかがい知る事はできないが、…きっと、姉妹が何の確執もなくじゃれ合っていた、楽しい子供時代の思い出なんだと思った。
TextENG: ......I couldn't look into her mind... but she was probably thinking back to those fun days, when they played as sisters without any antagonism.

TextJPN: 風が吹く度に、梢や葉がやさしく擦れ、サラサラというせせらぎのような音を立てた。
TextENG: Every time the wind blew, it caressed the treetops and the leaves, making a swishing, murmuring sound.

TextJPN: …魅音はずっと黙っていた。
TextENG: ...Mion remained silent for a long time.

TextJPN: 自らの手で、……消してしまった妹の思い出を、…辿っている。
TextENG: Thinking back... on her younger sister...... whom she had gotten rid of with her own hands.

TextJPN: それに俺は言葉をかける必要はない。
TextENG: There was no need for me to get a word in.

TextJPN: …こうして腕を組み、…並んで歩くだけで、…充分だった。
TextENG: ...Just walking like this... arm in arm... was enough.

TextJPN: …魅音がふと足を止め、向きを変えた。
TextENG: ...Mion suddenly stopped and turned.

TextJPN: 「……………………詩音は、まだ生きてる」
TextENG: ``............Shion is... still alive.``

TextJPN: 「……本当か」
TextENG: ``...Really?``

TextJPN: 魅音は俺の目をじっと見てから、静かに頷いた。
TextENG: Mion took a hard look into my eyes, then nodded quietly.

TextJPN: 「…………………うん。@k@vS02/03/130300519.……誰よりも惨たらしい死に方をさせてやろうと、ずっと考えて閉じ込めておいたけど。@k@vS02/03/130300520.………今日まで、その方法はとうとう思いつかなかった」
TextENG: ``............Yeah.@k@vS02/03/130300519. ...I'd been thinking to give her the most horrible death of all, so I had her locked up.@k@vS02/03/130300520. ......I never did think of a good way to do it, though.``

TextJPN: ……魅音は詩音のことを、口では嫌っているようだったけど、……心の奥底では嫌いきっていないのだ。
TextENG: ...Mion sounded as though she hated Shion... but also... deep down... she didn't completely detest her.

TextJPN: …だから、もう片方の手でわしわしと魅音の頭を撫でてやった。
TextENG: ...So I took my other hand and rustled Mion's hair with it.

TextJPN: 魅音は俺だけじゃない。@k詩音も、救っていたんだ。
TextENG: Mion didn't only save me.@k She saved Shion, too.

TextJPN: ……確かに魅音は鬼となって、多くの人を死に導いたかもしれないけれど。@k……こうして鬼に抗い、…救った命が…２つもあったじゃないか。
TextENG: ...Mion may have become a demon and led many people to their deaths.@k ......But she fought against it... and was able to save... two people.

TextJPN: 魅音は俺に撫でられるままに、…うっとりと目を細めていた。@k@|@y……そして、組んでいた腕をほどく。
TextENG: As I petted Mion... she narrowed her eyes in an entranced smile...@k@|@y and untangled her arm from mine.

TextJPN: そして…静かに言った。
TextENG: Then... Mion quietly said,

TextJPN: 「…………来て。@k@vS02/03/130300522.…私の罪の全てを、見て欲しいから。@k@vS02/03/130300523.……でもそれは圭ちゃんにとって、…この上なく辛い光景かもしれない」
TextENG: ``.........Come with me.@k@vS02/03/130300522. ...I want you to see all of my sins.@k@vS02/03/130300523. ...Although, Kei-chan... it might be the worst thing you've ever seen.``

TextJPN: 直感する。
TextENG: I could sense it.

TextJPN: ……そこにはきっと…これまでの犠牲者が並べられているのだろう。
TextENG: ...There I would probably find... all the sacrifices up until now.

TextJPN: …それを見るということは、…梨花ちゃんや沙都子の死を受け入れるということ。
TextENG: ...Looking at them... would mean accepting Rika-chan and Satoko's deaths.

TextJPN: そして…それを最高の親友が犯したことを……受け入れるということ。
TextENG: As well as... accepting that... my best friend had done it.

TextJPN: 「……………すでに起こり、終わってしまった事実だけれども。@k@vS02/03/130300525.……圭ちゃんは見ないことを選んでもいい。@k@vS02/03/130300526.そうならば、ここで待っていて。@k@vS02/03/130300527.…私の手で全て終わらせるから」
TextENG: ``............It's already happened, and it's in the past.@k@vS02/03/130300525. ......You can choose not to look, Kei-chan.@k@vS02/03/130300526. If you don't want to, then wait here.@k@vS02/03/130300527. ...I will personally end everything.``

TextJPN: 不吉な響きにぎょっとする。
TextENG: I was taken aback by how ominous that sounded.

TextJPN: ……レナに言われた言葉が蘇る。
TextENG: ......I remembered what Rena had told me.

TextJPN: 魅音は自分の身を司法に委ねず…自ら幕を引くつもりかもしれない。
TextENG: Mion might not surrender herself to justice... but choose to put an end to things herself.

TextJPN: …魅音をひとりにしてはいけない。
TextENG: ...I couldn't leave her on her own.

TextJPN: ……それに、最後のわがままとして、魅音に付き合っているんじゃないか。
TextENG: ...Besides, I agreed to her last request, didn't I?

TextJPN: ……たとえ俺にとって受け入れがたい事でも、…それを受け入れよう。
TextENG: ...Even if it was hard for me to accept... I'll still do it.

TextJPN: ……見ることを避けたって、……それはもう、……終わってしまった、……事実なのだから。
TextENG: ...Even if I avoided looking... it was... something... that had already happened.

TextJPN: 「…………………何を見たって」
TextENG: ``............It doesn't matter what I see.``

TextJPN: 「うん」
「…………………俺にとっての園崎魅音は、…最高の親友だ。@k@vS02/01/130101085.それは変わらない。@k@vS02/01/130101086.一生」
TextENG: ``............Mion Sonozaki... is the best friend I could ever have.@k@vS02/01/130101085. That won't change.@k@vS02/01/130101086. It never will.``

TextJPN: ざぁ…と梢を揺らす風が吹く…。
TextENG: The treetops softly swayed in the wind...

TextJPN: 「……………あんたもレナも。@k@vS02/03/130300530.………どうしてこんな時ばかりカッコ良くなるんだろうね」
TextENG: ``............You and Rena both.@k@vS02/03/130300530. ......Why do you only get really cool at times like this?``

TextJPN: いつもなら憎まれ口を叩いてお茶を濁すところだが、…今日はそうしない。@k…ただ笑って応えた。
TextENG: Normally I'd say something rude right back at her, evading the question... but today I didn't.@k ...I just answered with a smile.

TextJPN: やがて魅音は歩き出す。@k…深い森の…ずっと奥へ。
TextENG: At last, Mion started walking.@k ...Into the thick forest... into the deepest part.

TextJPN: けもの道のような細い道をずっと行くと、……やがて急な斜面に炭鉱か防空壕を思わせるようなトンネルがあった。
TextENG: After following a thin path that looked like an animal trail for a while... we finally came across a steep incline with a tunnel that reminded me of a coal mine or bomb shelter.

TextJPN: まわりは緩やかな斜面に囲まれ、外からでは死角になるように作られていた。
TextENG: We were surrounded by shallow hills—it had been created in a spot not visible from the outside.

TextJPN: ……あちらこちらの木々に、たくさんのカラスの影がある。
TextENG: ...There were many silhouettes of crows in the trees here and there.

TextJPN: ……それに、さっきから鼻を突く異臭は…間違いなくこの中から漏れてきていた。
TextENG: ...The abnormal odor I'd been smelling for a while... was doubtlessly escaping from inside this place.

TextJPN: 「………………引き返すなら今だよ。@k@vS02/03/130300532.圭ちゃんの中の園崎魅音がどんな人かは知らないけれど。@k@vS02/03/130300533.…中に入れば、…その魅音はきっと……、…………………」
TextENG: ``............If you want to turn back, now's your chance.@k@vS02/03/130300532. I don't know what kind of person Mion Sonozaki is to you...@k@vS02/03/130300533. but if you go inside... that Mion will probably...............``

TextJPN: 「変わらない。@k@vS02/01/130101088.何度だって言う。@k@vS02/01/130101089.…園崎魅音は、俺の最高の親友だ」
TextENG: ``She won't change.@k@vS02/01/130101088. I'll say it as many times as I need to.@k@vS02/01/130101089. ...Mion Sonozaki is the best friend I could ever have.``

TextJPN: 両拳をぐっと握る。
TextENG: I clench my fists.

TextJPN: ……きっとこの中には、…想像を絶する光景が広がっているだろう。
TextENG: ...Inside there... was probably a sight beyond anything I could imagine.

TextJPN: それは…ちょっと気を許せば、嘔吐しかねないものかもしれない。
TextENG: If... I let my guard down... I might end up vomiting.

TextJPN: でも耐えよう。@k…この痛みと苦しみを乗り越えよう。@k…それでも変わらず、…魅音は俺の最高の友人なんだから。
TextENG: Even so... I'll endure it.@k ...I'll overcome this pain and this suffering.@k ...It will never change... that Mion is my greatest friend.

TextJPN: 「………………私はただの鬼だから、…もう人間の気持ちはわからないけれど。@k@vS02/03/130300535.……魅音があんたを好きになったの、…よくわかる気がする」
TextENG: ``............I am nothing more than a demon... so I don't understand human feelings anymore.@k@vS02/03/130300535. ...I have a feeling, though... that I know why Mion fell in love with you.``

TextJPN: 「…他人事のように言うな。@k@vS02/01/130101091.お前は魅音だ。@k@vS02/01/130101092.鬼じゃない。@k@vS02/01/130101093.…血の通った人間で、俺の仲間なんだ」
TextENG: ``...Don't say that like it's not related to you.@k@vS02/01/130101091. You're Mion.@k@vS02/01/130101092. You're not a demon.@k@vS02/01/130101093. ...You're a human, with human blood, and you're my friend.``

TextJPN: …魅音は目元を拭うような仕草をしてから、トンネルの入口の大扉に手をかけた。
TextENG: ...Mion made a gesture like she was wiping tears from her eyes, then placed a hand on the big door of the tunnel entrance.

TextJPN: 厳重なカギが威圧している。
TextENG: The lock on it was dauntingly strong-looking.

TextJPN: …それは祭具殿と同じように、中に踏み入る者に相当の覚悟を促しているようだった。
TextENG: ...It seemed to demand the appropriate resolution from whoever would enter, just like the ritual storehouse.

TextJPN: 扉が観音開きで開き、…もわっとした生臭い空気とたくさんの羽虫が飛び出してきた。
TextENG: When the double doors opened... a stifling, rotten air and a bunch of winged insects came rushing out.

TextJPN: 昔、飼っていたカニの水槽をそのままベランダに放置して殺してしまい、…すごい臭いをさせてしまったのを思い出す。
TextENG: I remembered accidentally killing a hermit crab a long time ago by leaving its tank out on the porch... and how intense the odor it left was.

TextJPN: ……あれを死臭というのなら、…この臭いはまさにそれだった…。
TextENG: ...If that was the smell of a corpse... then that's certainly what this smelled like.

TextJPN: 中は真っ暗だったが、魅音がスイッチを入れると電球が灯り、照らし出される。
TextENG: Inside, it was pitch black, but Mion flicked a switch that turned on a light bulb, illuminating the interior.

TextJPN: 通路は木造のトンネル状になっていて、入り組んでいた。
TextENG: The path turned into a series of intricate wooden tunnels.

TextJPN: 途中には土蔵のような空間があったり、@k住まいのようになったものがあったり、@k…戦時中には防空壕や備蓄倉庫にも使われていたことをうかがわせる。
TextENG: We passed spaces that looked like they were for storage.@k We passed places that looked like someone had lived there.@k ...All this indicated that it had been used as a bomb shelter and stockpile during the war.

TextJPN: …だが防空壕のような、掘りっぱなしというイメージはなく、さながら、地下に作ったもうひとつの園崎家のような貫禄を漂わせている。
TextENG: ...It didn't give an impression of a dug-out bomb shelter that had just been left there, though—there was a sense of dignity, as though this were a second Sonozaki house constructed underground.

TextJPN: そんな真っ暗な地下を歩いているのに、どこかの通気孔から入ってくるセミの声がとても不思議な感じだった。
TextENG: Despite being in pitch darkness below the ground, the voices of the cicadas were entering through an air hole somewhere, giving it a very mysterious feel.

TextJPN: 「…祭具殿の中、見たよね。@k@vS02/03/130300537.あの拷問道具の山を。@k@vS02/03/130300538.……あれは全て、鬼ヶ淵村の厳しい戒律を守るために作られたものだった。@k@vS02/03/130300539.戒律を破った者を見せしめに惨たらしく殺してみせる、そういう道具だった」
TextENG: ``...You saw what was in the ritual storehouse, right?@k@vS02/03/130300537. The piles of torture instruments.@k@vS02/03/130300538. ...All of them were created to uphold the strict religious laws of Onigafuchi Village.@k@vS02/03/130300539. They were tools used to kill those who broke the laws in terrible ways as a warning to others.``
``............That was a long time ago.``

TextJPN: 「……本来は見せしめの儀式、綿流しは御三家が取り仕切る儀式だったんだけど、@k@vS02/03/130300541.…公由家と古手家の衰退、そして時代の変化によって、行なうことはとても難しくなった」
TextENG: ``...Watanagashi, originally a ritual meant as a deterrent, was once overseen by the Three Families...@k@vS02/03/130300541. but thanks to the Kimiyoshi and Furude families going into decline and the way the times changed, actually carrying it out became difficult.``

TextJPN: 「……そりゃそうだな。@k@vS02/01/130101096.…この現代日本で、犠牲者をのんびりと沢で殺せるなんて思えない」
TextENG: ``...I can imagine why.@k@vS02/01/130101096. ...You'd never think people could be okay with drowning people in a swamp and killing them in modern Japan.``

TextJPN: 「だから、……園崎家は作ったの。@k@vS02/03/130300543.…現代でも綿流しの儀が行なえるように、……秘密の場所を」
TextENG: ``That's why... the Sonozaki family built this.@k@vS02/03/130300543. ...A secret place... so that we could continue to conduct the rite of Watanagashi, even in modern times.``

TextJPN: 魅音が一際異質な大扉を開く……。
TextENG: Mion opened a large, strikingly different door...

TextJPN: ………その中は、@k@|@y…………紛れもなく、……現代の祭具殿だった………。
TextENG: ......and inside...@k@|@y ......was none other than... a modern storehouse for ritual implements......

TextJPN: 「…いろいろ、……あるでしょ。@k@vS02/03/130300545.一部のものは実際に祭具殿から運び込まれたものなんだよ」
TextENG: ``...There's... quite a few, isn't there?@k@vS02/03/130300545. Some of them were actually brought here from the original storehouse.``

TextJPN: ………………祭具殿にあったものは、どれも錆びて埃を被っていたので、どこか現実的でなかったが、@k……ここにあるものは違う。
TextENG: ............All of the things there had been rusty and covered in dust, so they didn't seem that real...@k but the things in here were different.

TextJPN: どれもよく手入れされ、…今すぐ使用できる状態に維持されていた。
TextENG: Every one of them had been well maintained... and kept in a state that they could be used right away.

TextJPN: 刃を持つものは刃先を光らせ、棘を持つものはその先端を尖らせている。
TextENG: Blades gleamed and spikes were sharpened.

TextJPN: 血が飛び散ることを予見しているのか…、@k壁も床もまるでお風呂場のようにタイル張りになっていて、……ゆるい傾斜の先には排水溝まで設けられていた。
TextENG: Also, perhaps as a precaution for the splatter of blood...@k the walls and ceiling were covered in the kind of tiling you would see in bathrooms... and there was even a drain set amidst a slight slope in the floor.

TextJPN: 飛び散った血を洗い流すためなのか、壁際にはとぐろをまいたゴムホースが蛇口に取り付けられていた。
TextENG: There was also a coiled rubber hose along the wall attached to a faucet, perhaps for cleaning up the splattered blood.

TextJPN: 「…大昔の当主の書き物によるとね。@k@vS02/03/130300547.…血の飛沫ってのは、犠牲者に負担をかけない割にはインパクトがあるんだってさ」
TextENG: ``...According to something a leader from a long time ago wrote...@k@vS02/03/130300547. Blood splatter has impact, despite the fact that it doesn't tax the sacrifice.``

TextJPN: 「……綿流しは見せしめのショーだったから。@k@vS02/03/130300549.私のご先祖さまたちは様々なショーを考案してたんだよ」
TextENG: ``...Watanagashi was meant as a deterrent, after all.@k@vS02/03/130300549. My ancestors thought up all different kinds of things to show off.``

TextJPN: 魅音がそう言って、暗がりに広がる秘密部屋の奥を指差す。
TextENG: As she said that, Mion pointed deeper into the torture room, to a spot veiled in darkness.

TextJPN: そこは…なんと畳敷きの座敷になっていて、……隅には座布団の山があった。
TextENG: There... was surprisingly a room floored with tatami mats... and in the corner was a pile of cushions.

TextJPN: 「……鑑賞席なんだよ。@k@vS02/03/130300551.綿流しは見せしめのショーだから。@k@vS02/03/130300552.客がいなきゃ意味がない」
TextENG: ``...They're seats for the audience.@k@vS02/03/130300551. Watanagashi was meant as a deterrent, after all.@k@vS02/03/130300552. It wouldn't make sense if there were no guests.``

TextJPN: 何も言えないし、…また何も言う言葉は思いつかなかった。
TextENG: I couldn't speak... and I couldn't think of anything to say anyway.

TextJPN: …ただ、魅音がこれらを俺に明かすことによって、心が軽くなるなら、俺はいくらでも聞く覚悟があった。
TextENG: ...Except that if Mion revealing all this to me made her heart feel any lighter, then I was prepared to listen for as long as I needed to.

TextJPN: 「みんなここで、………………私が殺した。@k@vS02/03/130300554.…見てくれている観客はいなかったけど、…私は綿流しを上手にやって見せた。@k@vS02/03/130300555.……いや、観客はひとりだけいたかな」
TextENG: ``Right here... ............is where I killed everyone.@k@vS02/03/130300554. ...There were no spectators to watch me... but I did the Watanagashi very well.@k@vS02/03/130300555. ...Well, perhaps there was one spectator.``

TextJPN: 「……私。@k@vS02/03/130300557.私という鬼が、魅音の執り行う綿流しをずっと見てたから」
TextENG: ``...Me.@k@vS02/03/130300557. I, the demon, was watching the entire time Mion held the Watanagashi ceremony.``

TextJPN: 魅音は自嘲気味にケタケタと笑う。
TextENG: Mion cackled in self-deprecation.

TextJPN: …気持ちのいい笑いではなかった。
TextENG: ...It wasn't a nice-sounding laugh.

TextJPN: 「向こうが牢屋」
TextENG: ``Back there is the prison.``

TextJPN: 「……詩音はそこにいるのか…？」
TextENG: ``...Is Shion there...?``

TextJPN: 小さく頷く。
TextENG: She nodded slightly.

TextJPN: ………もう、魅音の綿流しは…今日で終わりなのだ。
TextENG: ......Mion's Watanagashi... had ended today.

TextJPN: …俺は一刻も早く、詩音に身の安全を伝えなくてはならない。
TextENG: ...I needed to tell Shion that I was safe without a moment's delay.

TextJPN: ……詩音は今この瞬間も、いつ自分が殺されるのかと震えているに違いないのだから。
TextENG: ...After all, she was probably trembling in fear at this very moment, worrying about when she would be killed.

TextJPN: 物々しい扉が開き、残響からとてつもなく広い空間が広がっていることを知る。
TextENG: The ostentatious door on the other side opened, revealing what must have been an incredibly expansive space based on the echo it made.

TextJPN: 魅音が暗闇を探ると、あちらこちらでいくつかの裸電球が灯った。
TextENG: Mion groped around in the darkness, and a handful of naked light bulbs came on here and there.

TextJPN: …目が闇に慣れるに従い。おぼろげな灯りの中に大空洞が姿を現す…。
TextENG: ...As my eyes adjusted, more and more of the great cave showed itself in the faint light...

TextJPN: ここは剥き出しの岩肌で、防空壕という言葉が一番似合う、殺伐とした雰囲気だ…。
TextENG: The walls were bare rock surface, and it felt so savage that 'bomb shelter' was the most apt term for it...

TextJPN: そして、まるで巨大な果実を食い破った虫の穴が点在するかのように、あちこちに格子の入った小部屋が設けられていた。@k…それらのひとつひとつが牢屋であるとすぐにわかる。
TextENG: There were small, barred rooms built here and there, like holes made by insects biting their way through a giant piece of fruit.@k ...It was immediately clear that each one of them was a prison.

TextJPN: 「…………みんなは…どこにいるんだ。梨花ちゃんや沙都子は…、」
TextENG: ``.........Where is... everyone? Rika-chan, and Satoko...?``
``...Their corpses?``

TextJPN: ……あまりに単刀直入過ぎる言葉に顔をしかめてしまう。
TextENG: ...I grimaced at her having said it so outright.
``......Yeah.@k@vS02/01/130101103. ...That's right.@k@vS02/01/130101104. ...The poor things, being left here in the dark like this.``

TextJPN: 「……………虫が湧くと嫌だったから、井戸に捨てちゃったよ。@k@vS02/03/130300561.…………ごめん」
TextENG: ``............I didn't want them to get infested with bugs, so I threw them down the well.@k@vS02/03/130300561. .........I'm sorry.``

TextJPN: 死に顔すらも見られないのか…。
TextENG: So I can't even see their faces in death...

TextJPN: …改めて、……梨花ちゃんに打ち明けた後悔の念が沸き起こる。
TextENG: ...Once again... my feelings of regret at having confessed everything to Rika-chan came surging forth.

TextJPN: 魅音が語尾にごめんをつけなかったら、殴りかかっていたかもしれない。
TextENG: If Mion hadn't attached the word 'sorry' to the end of what she said, I might have punched her.

TextJPN: ……落ち着け前原圭一…。
TextENG: ...Calm down, Keiichi Maebara...

TextJPN: ……自分で言ったんだぞ、何があろうとも、園崎魅音は最高の友人だ、って！
TextENG: ...You said it yourself—no matter what, Mion Sonozaki is your greatest friend!
``......Yeah... My greatest friend...``

TextJPN: 自分に言い聞かせるように、…そう言った。
TextENG: I needed to hear myself say it out loud.

TextJPN: その時、奥のひとつの牢屋が、ガチャリと格子を鳴らせた。
TextENG: Then came the clattering of bars in one of the cells deeper in.

TextJPN: それに気付き、俺も顔をあげる。
TextENG: When I noticed it, I looked up as well.
``Ke... Kei-chan?!@k@vS02/06/130600548. Is that you, Kei-chan?!``

TextJPN: 牢屋のひとつに駆け寄る。
TextENG: I ran over to the cell.

TextJPN: ……格子の隙間から白い手が覗く。@k…詩音だった。
TextENG: ...White hands were peeking out through the gaps in the bars.@k ...It really was her.

TextJPN: 「大丈夫か、詩音！@k@vS02/01/130101110.　怪我はしていないのか…？！」
TextENG: ``Are you all right, Shion?!@k@vS02/01/130101110. Are you hurt...?!``

TextJPN: 「…ぃ………ぃや………いや、…………ぁああぁああぁあぁああぁあッ！！！！」
TextENG: ``...N...... no...... no......... nooooooooooooooooo!!!!``

TextJPN: 詩音が顔をくしゃくしゃにして絶叫する。
TextENG: Shion's face twisted out of shape as she screamed.

TextJPN: ……俺のすぐ後ろに、魅音の姿が現れたからだ。@k……そう。@k…詩音は全て終わったことをまだ知らないのだ。
TextENG: ...It was because Mion had appeared right behind me.@k ...Of course.@k ...Shion didn't know that everything was over yet.
``Calm down, Shion.@k@vS02/01/130101112. ...Everything is already over.@k@vS02/01/130101113. ...Everything.``

TextJPN: 興奮した詩音を鎮めようと、なるべく落ち着いた声で語りかける。
TextENG: I spoke in as calm a voice as I could manage to try and soothe the agitated Shion.

TextJPN: …だが詩音の叫びにかき消され、それはなかなか伝わらないようだった…。
TextENG: ...However, it didn't seem like it was getting through her screams...
``Shion.@k@vS02/03/130300563. ...How have you been...?``

``No more... please...!@k@vS02/06/130600551. No more!!@k@vS02/06/130600552. I don't want to see anyone else die!!!@k@vS02/06/130600553. If you hate me... then just kill me already!!!@k@vS02/06/130600554. I'm the one you hate, right?!@k@vS02/06/130600555. Kill me, kill me right now!!@k@vS02/06/130600556. Siiiiiiiiiiiiis!!!!``
``C... Calm down, Shion!@k@vS02/01/130101115. It's all over now.@k@vS02/01/130101116. ...It's going to be alright.@k@vS02/01/130101117. So calm down...``

TextJPN: ガシャガシャと鉄格子を揺らしながら叫ぶ詩音は、…まさに半狂乱だった。
TextENG: Shion, who was screaming and rattling the iron bars back and forth... was truly in a frantic state.

TextJPN: ……俺は小さく肩をすくめ、魅音に譲る。
TextENG: ......I gave a slight shrug of resignation, giving way to Mion.

TextJPN: …ここに閉じ込めたのが魅音で、…詩音をここまで怖がらせたのも魅音なら、……この日々を終わらせることができるのも魅音だけなのだと悟ったからだ…。
TextENG: ...I had realized that if Mion was the one who locked her in here... and if Mion was the one who had scared Shion this much... then Mion was also the only one who could put an end to this...

TextJPN: 魅音は俺の肩越しに、告げた。@k静かに。
TextENG: Mion spoke from over my shoulder.@k Quietly.

TextJPN: 「安心しなよ。@k@vS02/03/130300565.あんたは殺さない。@k@vS02/03/130300566.…まだまだ殺さないんだから。@k@vS02/03/130300567.……くっくっくっくっくっくっくっくっくっくっくっく…！！」
TextENG: ``Relax.@k@vS02/03/130300565. I won't kill you.@k@vS02/03/130300566. ...No, I won't kill you just yet.@k@vS02/03/130300567. ......Ku-ku-ku-ku-ku-ku-ku-ku-ku-ku-ku-ku...!!``

TextJPN: 詩音の錯乱をさらに煽るような…奇怪な声で笑い出す。
TextENG: She burst out into a bizarre laugh... as if trying to make Shion's madness even worse.

TextJPN: その笑いにつられるように…詩音がガタガタと震えだし、…わめきながら鉄格子をガシャガシャさせる…。
TextENG: Shion broke out into a fierce shiver... brought on by that laugh... and rattled the iron bars as she wailed...

TextJPN: 「もうやめてぇえぇえぇえッ！！！@k@vS02/06/130600558.　圭ちゃんを殺さないでぇええぇえ！！@k@vS02/06/130600559.　圭ちゃんは何の関係もないでしょ？！@k@vS02/06/130600560.　殺すなら早く私を…、私を殺してよ！！！@k@vS02/06/130600561.　もう誰が死ぬのも…嫌ぁああぁあぁぁああああぁッ！！！！」
TextENG: ``Please stoooooop!!!@k@vS02/06/130600558. Don't kill Kei-chaaaaan!!@k@vS02/06/130600559. Kei-chan has nothing to do with this, does he?!@k@vS02/06/130600560. If you're going to kill someone... then kill me right now!!!@k@vS02/06/130600561. I don't want anyone else... to dieeeeeeeee!!!!``

TextJPN: 「あっはははははははははははははははははははははッ！！！」
TextENG: ``Ah-hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahah!!!``

TextJPN: 「そんなに死にたければ、この男を殺した後に、ゆっくりとひき肉にしてやるよ。@k@vS02/03/130300570.…古式に則り、四肢の先端から少しずつ。@k@vS02/03/130300571.ガリゴリと削ってミンチにしてやる」
TextENG: ``If you want to die that badly, then after I've killed this man, I'll take my time making mincemeat out of you.@k@vS02/03/130300570. ...In accordance with the ancient rites, I'll do it slowly, starting with your extremities.@k@vS02/03/130300571. I'll shave you down and mince you.``

TextJPN: 「…あの肉挽き機はあんたのためにとっておいてあるんだからね」
TextENG: ``I had that mincing machine set up specifically for you, after all.``

TextJPN: 「…それとも、それで圭ちゃんをミンチにして見せた方が、あんたには面白いかなぁ？」
TextENG: ``...Or would it be funnier if I were to mince up Kei-chan in front of you?``

TextJPN: 「…お、おい、いい加減にしろ！@k@vS02/01/130101119.　今さら怖がらせてどうするんだよ…ッ？！」
TextENG: ``...H-Hey, quit it already!@k@vS02/01/130101119. What do you have to gain by scaring her at this point...?!``

TextJPN: 「だめぇえぇえッ！@k@vS02/06/130600563.　圭ちゃん、逃げてええぇぇえぇええええッ！！！」
TextENG: ``Nooooo!@k@vS02/06/130600563. Kei-chan, run awaaaaayyyyyy!!!``

TextJPN: 詩音にこの期に及んでとんでもない言葉を投げかける魅音を、叱り付けようとして。@k……後ろを振り向く俺。
TextENG: I tried to rebuke Mion for flinging terrible words at her this late in the game, but...@k when I turned around...

TextJPN: 魅音が三日月をさらに切り込んだような…信じられないくらい残酷に口元を歪ませて…笑っていた。
TextENG: Mion's mouth, so much so that it was hard to believe... had twisted into a shape even thinner than a crescent moon... it was a smile.

TextJPN: …電気的に直感する。
TextENG: ...I could sense it like a jolt of electricity.

TextJPN: ……ここにいるこいつは、…俺の親友の魅音でもなく。
TextENG: ......The person here... wasn't my best friend Mion.

TextJPN: 園崎本家を継ぎ、重い宿命に翻弄された園崎魅音でもない。@k……じゃあ、……こいつは……誰…？
TextENG: It wasn't the Mion Sonozaki who had been tossed about by her heavy duty of succeeding the Sonozaki family, either.@k ...Then... who... was she...?

TextJPN: バヅンッッ！！！！
TextENG: Ba-baamm!!!!

TextJPN: 後頭部をぶつけた時に見るような、チカチカとした火花がいっぱいに広がった気がした。
TextENG: I saw sparks flying before my eyes, like what happens when you get hit in the back of the head.

TextJPN: …全身の力が一瞬にして抜け、頭が急に重くなる。
TextENG: ...The strength in my body drained instantly, and my head suddenly became heavy.

TextJPN: …誘われるままに膝を折り、床に叩き付ける。
TextENG: ...My knees buckled under the temptation and hit the floor.

TextJPN: …それから、全身をばったりと倒す。
TextENG: ...Then, my whole body abruptly collapsed.

TextJPN: 顔面をそのまま床に叩きつけたはずなのに、まるで羽毛布団の上に倒れこむような心地よさがあった…。
TextENG: My face should have hit the floor, but it was comfortable, as if I had fallen onto a down-filled futon...

TextJPN: ……意識がふらふらと遠のく。
TextENG: ......My consciousness reeled, then receded.

TextJPN: まるで、車の中で居眠りをしていて…、半分だけ起きて両親の会話を遠くに聞いているような、……そんな意識の遠さ。
TextENG: It was the kind of sensation... like if you took a nap in the car... but you were still half-awake, and could listen to your parents talking as if they were far away.

TextJPN: いや、聞いているというよりは聞こえているだけ。
TextENG: No, you wouldn't be listening, you would only be hearing it.

TextJPN: ……どこか遠くの出来事で、その内容は自分とは遠く無縁で無興味…。
TextENG: ...It was happening so far away, and the conversation was completely unrelated to you, so you would have no interest in it...

TextJPN: ……だから耳元で詩音が叫ぼうと魅音が下品に大笑いしようと、うるさくも思わなかったし、興味もわかなかった。
TextENG: ...So whether Shion was yelling in my ears or Mion was in vulgar hysterics, I didn't think it annoying, nor did it interest me.

TextJPN: 「さぁて…どんな方法で料理してやろうかねぇ！@k@vS02/03/130300575.　そうだ。釘台なんかどうかなぁ？@k@vS02/03/130300576.　あのチビガキ二人組に試したかったんだけど、手が小さくて拘束台にサイズが合わなかったからねぇ！！」
TextENG: ``Now then... I wonder how I should go about preparing you!@k@vS02/03/130300575. Oh, yes. What do you think of a bed of nails?@k@vS02/03/130300576. I tested it on those two little brats, but their hands were too small for the restraining table!!``

TextJPN: 「あれにしようあれにしよう、あっはははははははははははは！！」
TextENG: ``Let's do that, let's do that! Ah-hahahahahahahahaha!!``

TextJPN: 魅音が俺を後ろから抱き上げ、ずるずると引きずり出す。@k…踵が擦れて、靴が片方脱げる。
TextENG: Mion held me up from behind and dragged me across the floor.@k ...The soles of my feet scraped on it, and one of my shoes fell off.

TextJPN: 「駄目ぇええぇええぇ！！！@k@vS02/06/130600565.　もうやめてよお姉ぇえぇえ……！！@k@vS02/06/130600566.　…もう………やめて…………………ぅあぁぁぁ…ぁぁ…ぁ…」
TextENG: ``Noooooooooo!!!@k@vS02/06/130600565. Please, stop, siiiiiiiiiiiiis...!!@k@vS02/06/130600566. ...Please...... stop...... .........uahhh... aah... ah...``

TextJPN: 詩音の感情がはじけて…号泣した。
TextENG: Shion's emotions exploded outward... and she burst into bitter weeping.

TextJPN: …その泣き声は魅音の興味をいたくそそったらしく、俺を放り出して再び牢屋の前に戻った。
TextENG: ...As if her crying had whetted Mion's interest, she held flung me down and returned to the prison cell again.

TextJPN: 「…あんたもかわいい声で泣けるじゃない？」
TextENG: ``...My, you sure can cry with a cute voice, can't you?``

TextJPN: 「あんたのワザとらしい空威張りには虫唾が走ってたんだけど、やっぱりそういうあんたが一番似合ってるよ。@k@vS02/03/130300580.くっくっくっく！」
TextENG: ``Your unnatural bravado was making my skin crawl, but this definitely suits you the best.@k@vS02/03/130300580. Ku-ku-ku-ku!``

TextJPN: 「…………魅音姉さま。@k@vS02/06/130600568.お願いです。@k@vS02/06/130600569.…私をどういう風に殺しても構いませんから。@k@vS02/06/130600570.…どうか圭ちゃんだけは見逃してあげてください。@k@vS02/06/130600571.…お願いです…………………」
TextENG: ``.........Mion, my big sister.@k@vS02/06/130600568. I beg you.@k@vS02/06/130600569. ...I don't care how you choose to kill me, but...@k@vS02/06/130600570. please, at least let Kei-chan go.@k@vS02/06/130600571. ...I'm begging you............``

TextJPN: ……姉よりも一枚上手に見えていた詩音。
TextENG: ...Shion had always acted as though she were a cut above her older sister.

TextJPN: …その詩音は、…あの平和だった頃からは想像もつかないような哀れな声で…、@k…かつて小馬鹿にしていた姉に、平伏し、許しを請うていた。
TextENG: ...That Shion... in such a miserable voice that I couldn't have imagined it during those peaceful times...@k ...prostrated herself before the older sister she used to scoff at and pleaded forgiveness.

TextJPN: それを冷淡に見下ろす魅音の顔には、…明らかに@bゆえつ.@<愉悦@>の笑みが浮かんでいた。
TextENG: Mion looked down with an expression of cool indifference... one that was plainly smiling with joy.

TextJPN: 「…あんたの希望なんか聞くつもりは全然なかったんだけど。@k@vS02/03/130300582.あんたがあまりにも面白い声で泣くものだから。@k@vS02/03/130300583.何だか聞いててやってもいいような気がしてきたかな」
TextENG: ``...You know, I wasn't planning on listening to your petty wishes.@k@vS02/03/130300582. The way you're crying, though, is just too funny...@k@vS02/03/130300583. I think maybe I'll change my mind and listen to you.

TextJPN: 「……思えばあんたには姉らしいこと、何にもしてやれなかったからね」
TextENG: ...Since come to think of it, I never did anything big-sister-like for you.``

TextJPN: 「じゃあさ。@k@vS02/03/130300586.これまでのことを謝ってみせてよ。@k@vS02/03/130300587.そうしたら私も、これまでのことをすっかり水に流してあげてもいいかな。@k@vS02/03/130300588.…そうしたら圭ちゃんだけは見逃してあげなくもないよ」
TextENG: ``All right then.@k@vS02/03/130300586. Let's hear you apologize for everything.@k@vS02/03/130300587. Then maybe I'll let it all be water under the bridge...@k@vS02/03/130300588. ...and maybe, just maybe, I'll let Kei-chan go.``

TextJPN: ……俺を見逃さないこともないとは言うが、…詩音を見逃すとは一言も言わない。
TextENG: ...Mion said she might let me go... but she never said anything about letting Shion go.

TextJPN: やがて、…格子の向こうに詩音が土下座するように這いつくばり、……弱々しい声で謝罪の言葉を口にし始めた。
TextENG: Before long... Shion got on her hands and knees behind the bars... and began to speak weak words of apology.

TextJPN: ……それはか細く聞き取ることはできないが、…その意思だけは伝わってくる。
TextENG: ...They were too faint for me to hear... but their intention got across.

TextJPN: 魅音はこれ以上ないくらい愉快な顔をして聞いていたにも拘らず、格子を蹴飛ばして不服だと告げた。
TextENG: Despite having watched her with a magnificently jubilant expression, Mion kicked the bars and declared she was unsatisfied.

TextJPN: 「…そんなので私の積年の怨み辛みが償えると思ってるわけ？@k@vS02/03/130300590.　こんなんじゃ駄目だね」
TextENG: ``...You think you can make up for years of grudges and hard feelings like that?@k@vS02/03/130300590. That just will not do.``

TextJPN: 「……やっぱり圭ちゃんから挽き肉だぁあぁ！！！！」
TextENG: ``...I guess I'll make mincemeat out of you both!!!!``
``Nooooooooooooooo!!!@k@vS02/06/130600576. Wait, sis!!!!@k@vS02/06/130600577. One more chance!!@k@vS02/06/130600578. Just one more chance...!!``

TextJPN: ……魅音はやれやれと言った感じで足を止めもう一度振り返る。
TextENG: ...Mion stopped and waved her hand again in resignation.

TextJPN: …だがそれは仕方なくといった感じでなく、……詩音を虐めて楽しむ以外の何ものでもない。
TextENG: ...Not because she had grown impatient... but only because she was taking delight in abusing Shion.

TextJPN: 「……ろくろく満足に謝れないあんただからね。@k@vS02/03/130300593.…特別にお姉が心に届く謝罪の仕方ってのを教えてあげるよ。@k@vS02/03/130300594.……一度しか教えないし、一言一句でも間違えたらアウト。@k@vS02/03/130300595.……いいね？」
TextENG: ``...You can't apologize to my satisfaction anyway.@k@vS02/03/130300593. ...I'll teach you how to make an apology that will get through to your older sister.@k@vS02/03/130300594. ...I'm only going to tell you once, and if you get even a letter wrong, you're out.@k@vS02/03/130300595. ...Got it?``

TextJPN: 泣き叫び…すっかり喉を潰してしまった…詩音の哀れな声。
TextENG: Shion's miserable voice... cried out... having become utterly hoarse.

TextJPN: …胸を掻き毟られる感触が…少しずつ戻ってくる。@k……それは湧き上がる怒りの感情。
TextENG: ...The sensation tearing through my chest... returned a little at a time.@k ...I realized...

TextJPN: ……悟る。
TextENG: it was feelings of anger bubbling up.

TextJPN: 俺は少しずつ…体に自由を取り戻しつつある…！
TextENG: I was slowly... regaining control of my body...!

TextJPN: だが、それは肌の感触や血流を感じることができるようになっただけのこと。
TextENG: However, I was only able to feel my skin and my blood flowing at the moment.

TextJPN: …自分の意思で指を動かすには…まだまだ至らない………！
TextENG: ...I still couldn't... voluntarily move my fingers......!

TextJPN: 「…ちゃんと覚えられたかなぁ。@k@vS02/03/130300597.ではやってごらん。@k@vS02/03/130300598.誠心誠意徹頭徹尾、心をこめてね。@k@vS02/03/130300599.…………………ちゃぁんと出来たなら、あんただけを殺してあげるから」
TextENG: ``...Did you memorize it?@k@vS02/03/130300597. Then let's hear you say it.@k@vS02/03/130300598. Sincerely and faithfully, from beginning to end, with all your heart.@k@vS02/03/130300599. ............If you can do it properly, then I'll only kill you.``

TextJPN: 「…はぃ…、ありがとうございます……ありがとうございます…！」
TextENG: ``...Yes... Thank you... Thank you so much...!``

TextJPN: ……何かがおかしい…。@kいつの間にかおかしい…。
TextENG: ......Something was strange...@k Something had become strange at some point...

TextJPN: …ついさっきまで……こいつは確かに魅音だったのに…、@k……いつの間にかいつの間にか……魅音じゃない誰かになっている…！！
TextENG: ...Until just a few moments ago... I was sure this had been Mion, but...@k ...At some point, at some point... she had become someone else...!!

TextJPN: 俺のよく知る魅音は…こんな、人間の尊厳を踏みにじって楽しむような卑劣なことは絶対にしない…ッ！！！
TextENG: The Mion I knew well... would never do something so nasty like enjoy trampling all over someone's dignity like this...!!!

TextJPN: 「さ。@k@vS02/03/130300601.やってごらん。@k@vS02/03/130300602.お姉ちゃんはちゃんと聞いててあげるから」
TextENG: ``Now.@k@vS02/03/130300601. Let's hear it.@k@vS02/03/130300602. Your big sister is listening closely.``
``............Shi... Shion Sonozaki is...``

TextJPN: さっき、詩音の牢屋に駆け寄った時、俺のすぐ後ろで、本物と偽者が入れ替わったんじゃないのか…？！
TextENG: When I ran over to Shion's cell earlier, had the real thing been swapped out with a fake right behind me...?!

TextJPN: とにかく…こんなのは断じて、……魅音なんかじゃない！！
TextENG: Anyway... this couldn't... possibly be Mion!!

TextJPN: 「……園崎詩音は………魅音姉さまの足元にも及ばない、醜く情け知らずな愚か者でございます…。@k@vS02/06/130600586.…身の程をわきまえず…お姉さまに働いた…か、数々の無礼を、お、思えば……、ぅっく……、」
TextENG: ``...Shion Sonozaki...... is a lowly, worthless sow not fit to even lick her big sister Mion's feet...@k@vS02/06/130600586. ...and when I think of... th-the countless times I've been rude... to my big sister... w-without knowing my place... uhk......``

TextJPN: 「ほらほらその調子。@k@vS02/03/130300604.…少しは許してあげようかなって気になってきたよ～？」
TextENG: ``Yes, yes, that's the spirit.@k@vS02/03/130300604. ...I'll permit you to say a little more now, okay~?``

TextJPN: ……全身に血が巡る…。
TextENG: ...Blood circulated through my whole body...

TextJPN: 痺れた感覚が戻ってくる…。
TextENG: My numbed senses were returning...

TextJPN: まだ…もう少し…！！
TextENG: Just... a little more...!!

TextJPN: …魅音が、…いや、魅音に似たあいつが詩音に気をとられている間に……早く…ッ！！
TextENG: ...While Shion is still holding Mion's... no, that thing pretending to be Mion's attention...... Hurry up...!!

TextJPN: 「……生意気だったこれまでを…反省し、……一生、…み、魅音姉さまに忠誠を誓います…。@k@vS02/06/130600588.…ですから……ぅぅ………、」
TextENG: ``...I reflect on... how impertinent I've been... and swear loyalty to my big sister Mion... for the rest of my life...@k@vS02/06/130600588.  ...So... uuh......``

TextJPN: 「あっはははははははははははははははははははははははははは……ッ！！」
TextENG: ``Ah-hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha......!!``

TextJPN: 魅音の大笑いが、大空洞に響き渡りものすごい声になって響き渡る。
TextENG: Mion's burst of laughter echoed throughout the big cave, growing to a terrifying level.

TextJPN: ……それは、この世に生ける者の笑いではない。@k…紛れもなく、…地の底の、…鬼の笑い。
TextENG: ...That was not the laugh of someone who was alive in this world.@k ...It was none other... than the laugh of a demon... from the bowels of the earth.

TextJPN: 飽きるまで腹の底から笑うと、突然ぷっつりと切れるように笑うのをやめた。
TextENG: She laughed from her stomach until she grew tired of it, and stopped smiling suddenly as if snipping a wire.

TextJPN: 「いいよ、もう。@k@vS02/03/130300607.…充分面白かったわ。@k@vS02/03/130300608.あんたがそこまでプライドを捨てられるとは思わなかったから。@k@vS02/03/130300609.うんうん。@k@vS02/03/130300610.充分に愉快」
TextENG: ``All right already.@k@vS02/03/130300607. ...That was funny enough for me.@k@vS02/03/130300608. I didn't think you'd throw away that much of your pride.@k@vS02/03/130300609. Mm-hmm.@k@vS02/03/130300610. That was plenty enjoyable.``

TextJPN: 魅音は…、ようやく全身に感覚が戻りかけてきた俺を再び引きずり、…秘密部屋へ引っ張っていく。
TextENG: Mion... began to drag me again, after I finally got the feeling in my body back... and pulled me towards the torture chamber.

TextJPN: 「安心しなって。@k@vS02/03/130300612.ちゃあんとあんたは殺してあげるよ。@k@vS02/03/130300613.……圭ちゃんの悲鳴をたぁっぷりと聞かせた後にね…！」
TextENG: ``Don't worry, all right?@k@vS02/03/130300612. I'll be sure to kill you real good.@k@vS02/03/130300613. ...After letting you get an earful of Kei-chan's screams, that is...!``

TextJPN: 「……………………………………ぃ、……嫌ァああぁぁあああぁあああああああぁぁあぁああッ！！」
TextENG: ``............N... Nooooooooooooooooooooooooooo!!``

TextJPN: 秘密部屋に引きずられてきた俺は、手際よく拘束台に縛り付けられていった。@kあっという間に大の字に拘束されてしまう…。
TextENG: After dragging me to the torture chamber, she skillfully strapped me into the restraining table.@k Before I knew it, I was sprawled out and bound...

TextJPN: 握り拳すらも満足に作れない両手を無理やり開き、手を広げ、指の一本一本まで厳重に拘束する…。
TextENG: She forced open my hands, with which I couldn't even make a satisfying fist, and tightly restrained each one of my fingers...

TextJPN: ……手ばかり、それも指ばかりが厳重に、蝶番でぎりぎりと締め付けられ固定される。
TextENG: ...She fastened only my hands, and my fingers at that, tightly with hinges and locked them in place.

TextJPN: 「……お姉ぇえっぇぇぇえぇ…、殺さないでぇえぇぇえええ……、お姉ぇええええぇえぇ……！！」
TextENG: ``...Siiiiiiiiiiiis... Don't kill hiimmmm... Siiiiiiiiiiiiiiiis...!!``

TextJPN: 牢屋のある大空洞への扉は開け放たれていたので、詩音の無念の叫びはずっと聞こえてきていた。
TextENG: The door to the big cave with the jails had been left open, so I could hear Shion's cries of mortification the entire time.

TextJPN: 「聞こえるかい詩音！@k@vS02/03/130300615.　これから始めるよぉ！！@k@vS02/03/130300616.　圭ちゃんの若い悲鳴をたっぷりと楽しみなぁ！！」
TextENG: ``Can you hear it, Shion!?@k@vS02/03/130300615. I'm going to get started now!!@k@vS02/03/130300616. Please, enjoy Kei-chan's young screams!!``
``............Give it a fucking rest...``

TextJPN: 体に感覚が戻り、初めに俺が起こした行動は魅音に似たそいつに吐きかける呪いの言葉だった。
TextENG: The feeling in my body returned, and the first action I took was to tell off that thing that looked like Mion.

TextJPN: 「ようやくお目覚め？@k@vS02/03/130300618.　私、さっき嘘をついたね。@k@vS02/03/130300619.…詩音を、一番惨たらしく殺してやろうと思って閉じ込めておいたけど、まだ思いつかないって言ったヤツ。@k@vS02/03/130300620.あれが嘘」
TextENG: ``Awake at last, are we?@k@vS02/03/130300618. I lied before, you know.@k@vS02/03/130300619. ...About having wanted to give Shion the most miserable death of all, but locking her up because I hadn't thought of a good way yet.@k@vS02/03/130300620. That was a lie.``

TextJPN: 魅音は工具箱のようなものを持ってくる。
TextENG: Mion brought over something like a toolbox.

TextJPN: そして、見るからに歪な形をした五寸釘を並べ始めた。
TextENG: ...From inside it, she removed a large, metal hammer, and next to that, she began to line up what looked like long, strangely-shaped nails whose ends had been turned into hooks like the kind you'd see on a harpoon.

TextJPN: 「あの子に、自分のせいで死ぬ大勢の人の悲鳴をたっぷりと聞かせて、体の芯まで染み透らせてから殺すの。@k@vS02/03/130300622.……なかなかセンスいいでしょ。@k@vS02/03/130300623.くっくっくっく！！」
TextENG: ``I'll let her hear the screams of all those people that died because of her, and after they've soaked in to her very soul, then I'll kill her.@k@vS02/03/130300622. ......I've got pretty good taste, huh?@k@vS02/03/130300623. Ku-ku-ku-ku!!``
``Hah?@k@vS02/03/130300625. I'm Mion.@k@vS02/03/130300626. Mion Sonozaki.@k@vS02/03/130300627. ...Has the fear driven you crazy? Ku-ku-ku!``
``............No, you're not.@k@vS02/01/130101123. ...There's... no way you can be Mion Sonozaki...!``

TextJPN: 魅音は鼻で笑いながら…、恐ろしい拷問の準備をちゃくちゃくと進めていく…。
TextENG: Mion snorted... and continued her preparations for the horrifying torture...

TextJPN: 「………へぇ。@k@vS02/03/130300629.じゃあ私が魅音じゃなかったら、私ゃ誰なわけぇ？」
TextENG: ``...I see.@k@vS02/03/130300629. Then if I'm not Mion, who am I?``

TextJPN: 「……………………お前は魅音じゃない。@k@vS02/01/130101126.……さっきまで一緒だった魅音を返せ」
TextENG: ``............You're not Mion.@k@vS02/01/130101126. ...Mion was just here. Give her back.``

TextJPN: 「……圭ちゃん、本当に頭は大丈夫？@k@vS02/03/130300632.　恐怖で頭がどうかなっちゃった？」
TextENG: ``...Kei-chan, is your brain really doing okay?@k@vS02/03/130300632. You're not going crazy with fear?``

``Don't touch me!!!@k@vS02/01/130101128. ...You damn demon...!!!@k@vS02/01/130101129. Give her back!!@k@vS02/01/130101130. Give Mion back!!!@k@vS02/01/130101131. My best friend... give Mion baaaaaaack!!!``

TextJPN: ……魅音は俺が何を言い出すのかと、しばらくの間、ぽかんとして聞いていた。
TextENG: ...Mion stood there for a few moments with her jaw hanging open, not having expected me to say that.

TextJPN: 俺自身、…自分が錯乱しかけていることはわかっていた。
TextENG: I myself knew... that I was about to go insane.

TextJPN: …魅音を目の前にして、魅音を返せなどと…世迷言であることはわかってる。@kでも……でも…！@k　目の前の今のこいつは…断じて魅音ではありえないッ！！！@k　認めるわけには…いかないのだ…！！
TextENG: ...I knew it was nonsense... to demand Mion's return when she was right in front of me.@k But... but...!@k This person in front of me... couldn't possibly have been Mion!!!@k There was no way... I could accept that...!!

TextJPN: だから…俺は思った。
TextENG: So... this is what I thought.

TextJPN: 魅音には…本当に鬼が取り憑いていて……、二重人格のような状態にして魅音を操っているのだ…！！！
TextENG: Mion really had... been possessed by a demon... and was controlling Mion as if it were a separate personality...!!!

TextJPN: 魅音はそれに操られたただの被害者で……本当の悪いやつは…こいつ！
TextENG: Mion was just a victim being manipulated by it... The evil one was really... this thing!

TextJPN: この取り憑いた鬼の仕業に違いない…ッ！！！
TextENG: It all had to be the doing of this demon possessing her...!!!

TextJPN: 「あーっはっはっはっはっはっはっはっはっはっはっは！！！　あーっはっはっはっはっはっはっはっはっはっはっはっはっは！！！」
TextENG: ``Ahhh-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!!! Ahhh-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!!!``

TextJPN: それを聞いた魅音は…げらげらと大笑いし、むせ返って咳き込むくらいに笑い転げた。
TextENG: When Mion heard that... she started to guffaw, laughing so hysterically that she started to cough and almost choked.

TextJPN: 「……………あんたって、…本当におめでたい人だね。@k@vS02/03/130300635.園崎魅音に殺されようとしているこの瞬間に、目の前の私を否定するわけ？@k@vS02/03/130300636.　……こんな面白い人が世の中にいるなんて初めて知ったわ」
TextENG: ``............You really are... a piece of work, you know that?@k@vS02/03/130300635. In this very moment, Mion Sonozaki is trying to kill you, and you're trying to reject me?@k@vS02/03/130300636. ...I never knew there was such a funny person in all the world.``

TextJPN: 「……………………笑いたければ好きなだけ笑え。@k@vS02/01/130101133.…だがお前が何を言おうと、俺はお前が魅音だなんて認めない。@k@vS02/01/130101134.…魅音を返せ。@k@vS02/01/130101135.退け、鬼めッ！！！！」
TextENG: ``............If you want to laugh, do it all you want.@k@vS02/01/130101133. ...No matter what you say, though, I won't accept that you're Mion.@k@vS02/01/130101134. ...Give her back.@k@vS02/01/130101135. Away with you, demon!!!!``

TextJPN: 「わーっはっはっはっはっはっはっはっはっはっはっは！！！@k@vS02/03/130300638.　…圭ちゃん、…私を笑い涙で溺れ殺すつもり…？@k@vS02/03/130300639.　わーっはっはっはっはっはっはっはっはっは！！！」
TextENG: ``Wahhh-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!!!@k@vS02/03/130300638. ...Kei-chan... Are you trying to kill me by drowning me in my own tears...?@k@vS02/03/130300639. Wahhh-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!!!``

TextJPN: だが…俺はそんな笑い声に負けたりしない。@k大声で叫ぶ。
TextENG: No matter what... I wouldn't lose to that laughter of hers.@k I shouted loudly.

TextJPN: …目の前の魅音の内側に閉じ込められてしまった…本当の魅音に聞こえるように、…心の底から………。
TextENG: ...I shouted from the bottom of my heart... so that the real Mion, trapped inside the Mion I saw in front of me... would be able to hear......

TextJPN: 「がんばれ魅音…！@k@vS02/01/130101137.　こんな…鬼畜生に負けるな…！！！@k@vS02/01/130101138.　本当に強い…お前の力を見せてくれぇえぇえ！！！」
TextENG: ``You can do it, Mion...!@k@vS02/01/130101137. Don't... lose to this piece of shit demon...!!!@k@vS02/01/130101138. You're strong... Show me how strong you aaaareee!!!``

TextJPN: 「わっはっはっはっはっはっはっは！　わーっはっはっはっはっはっはっはっは！！！」
TextENG: ``Wah-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha! Wahhh-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!!!``

TextJPN: 涙がこみ上げてぼろぼろと溢れ出す…。
TextENG: The tears welled up and flooded down her face...

TextJPN: 両手が拘束されているから、それを拭うこともできず、流れるに任せた。
TextENG: Her hands were busy with the restraints, so she couldn't even wipe them—she just let them flow.

TextJPN: 「頼むよ……魅音…！！！@k@vS02/01/130101140.　魅音！！@k@vS02/01/130101141.　どこで…お前はこんな鬼に負けちまったんだ？！@k@vS02/01/130101142.　お前はこんな弱いヤツじゃないだろ？！@k@vS02/01/130101143.　負けるな…、戦え、…戦えぇえぇえ！！！」
TextENG: ``Please... Mion...!!!@k@vS02/01/130101140. Mion!!@k@vS02/01/130101141. Where... did you lose to a demon like this?!@k@vS02/01/130101142. You're not that weak, are you?!@k@vS02/01/130101143. Don't lose... Fight... Fight!!!``

TextJPN: 魅音の右手には金槌。@k小脇には何十本もの釘がある。
TextENG: ...In her left hand was the hammer.@k ...At her side were dozens more nails.

TextJPN: ……これから何が行なわれようとしているのか…嫌でもわかる。
TextENG: ...I could tell what she was about to do... though I wish I couldn't.

TextJPN: …でも…怖がってなんかいられなかった。@k…だから叫んだ！！
TextENG: ...Even so... I couldn't afford to be scared.@k ...That was why I shouted!!

TextJPN: 「わーっはっはっはっはっはっはっは……。@k@vS02/03/130300642.はぁ、……お腹の筋肉がよじれて痛いよ」
TextENG: ``Wahh-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha......@k@vS02/03/130300642. Haah...... My sides hurt like they're about to split.``

TextJPN: 「………もういい？@k@vS02/03/130300644.　そろそろ始めるよ？@k@vS02/03/130300645.　いい声を出してね。@k@vS02/03/130300646.これは圭ちゃんへの拷問である以上に、詩音への拷問なんだからさ」
TextENG: ``......Is that all?@k@vS02/03/130300644. I'm going to get started now.@k@vS02/03/130300645. Be sure to give her some good screams.@k@vS02/03/130300646. Not only am I torturing you, Kei-chan, but I'm torturing Shion as well.``

TextJPN: あとは…男泣き。@k……嗚咽しか出なかった。
TextENG: Then... I wept.@k ...Only sobs came out.

TextJPN: …それはこれから行なわれる拷問への観念なんかじゃない。
TextENG: ...They weren't in acceptance of the torture about to be performed, however.

TextJPN: ………魅音が…鬼に負けてしまった何かへの、無念だった。
TextENG: ......They were tears of regret... that Mion had lost to the demon.

TextJPN: ……だが、目の前の魅音に小さな変化が起こった。
TextENG: ...Yet, a small change did occur in the Mion in front of me.

TextJPN: ……高まった興奮が…少しずつ引いていっているのだ。
TextENG: ...Her heightened excitement... was draining, little by little.

TextJPN: …俺が気付いた時、……目の前のそいつは、……魅音は取り戻していた。
TextENG: ...By the time I'd realized it... the one in front of me... had returned to being Mion.

TextJPN: 「……………圭ちゃん。@k@vS02/03/130300648.…冥土の土産、…なんて気の利いたものじゃないけれど。@k@vS02/03/130300649.…………どうしても知りたがっているようだから、ひとつだけ教えてあげるよ」
TextENG: ``............Kei-chan.@k@vS02/03/130300648. ...This may not be... something pleasant to take to the grave with you.@k@vS02/03/130300649. .........You really seem to want to know, though, so I'll tell you just one thing.``

TextJPN: …………それが魅音なのか、……鬼が取り戻したつかの間の人心なのかは、…わからない。
TextENG: .........I didn't know... if this was Mion... or just a display of momentary humanity the demon had recovered.

TextJPN: 「………私の中に鬼が宿ったのはずいぶん前。@k@vS02/03/130300651.…その鬼は私を蝕み凶行に駆り立てようとした。@k@vS02/03/130300652.……だけれど、私はそれを理性で抑えつけた」
TextENG: ``......A long time before the demon came to live inside me.@k@vS02/03/130300651. ...It was gnawing at my heart, trying to spur me to violence, but...@k@vS02/03/130300652. I suppressed it with my reason.``

TextJPN: 「……鬼はそれで治まり、…私は、その鬼はどこかへ行ってしまったんだと思い込んでいた。@k@vS02/03/130300654.……でも、本当は違った。@k@vS02/03/130300655.…………私の中から出て行ったんじゃなく、…私の中で眠っていただけだったの」
TextENG: ``...That settled the demon down... and I got to thinking it had gone away somewhere.@k@vS02/03/130300654. ...As it turned out, I was wrong.@k@vS02/03/130300655. .........It hadn't left me... it had just gone to sleep.``

TextJPN: …………魅音の目元に…涙が溜まっているのに、気付く。
TextENG: .........I noticed that there were... tears forming in her eyes.

TextJPN: 「……その鬼は、…ある小さなことをきっかけにまた目覚めてしまった。@k@vS02/03/130300657.………それは…何に原因があったと思う…？」
TextENG: ``...The demon... woke up again due to a certain, small opportunity.@k@vS02/03/130300657. ......What do you think... that opportunity was...?``

TextJPN: ………………………………………魅音の瞳に、悲しい、でも責めるような光。
TextENG: ............There was a sad, and yet reproachful light in Mion's eyes.
``......Do you understand?``

TextJPN: 魅音が鬼に負けてしまったきっかけが…わからない。
TextENG: I don't know... what gave the demon the chance to beat Mion.

TextJPN: 「…………………………………。@k@vS02/03/130300660.鬼の私が教えるのも変だけれど。@k@vS02/03/130300661.……あんたが全てを狂わせてしまった元凶」
TextENG: ``............@k@vS02/03/130300660.This might be strange for me, a demon, to say.@k@vS02/03/130300661. ...But You're the reason that everything got so messed up.``

TextJPN: ……魅音の目から…溜まった涙がすーっと、…こぼれる。
TextENG: ...The tears welling up... in her eyes... spilled downward all of a sudden.

TextJPN: 「……………………あの時、…あんたがもらった人形を、躊躇なく私に渡していたなら、…………全ては狂いださなかったかもしれない」
TextENG: ``............At the time... if you had given me that doll you got without hesitating......... maybe everything wouldn't have gotten so twisted.``

TextJPN: もらった人形…。
TextENG: The doll I got...

TextJPN: ……あの、……日曜日におもちゃ屋で部活をした時にもらった……人形……。
TextENG: ...That.. doll that I got... when we had our club meeting at the toy store that Sunday...

TextJPN: 俺……が、すべての元凶、だって……？
TextENG: I...... am the source of all this, because......?

TextJPN: わからない。魅音がいったい何を指してそう言っているのか、全然わからない。
TextENG: I don't know. I have no idea what the hell Mion is talking about when she says that.

TextJPN: 「………圭ちゃんには理解できないだろうね。@k@vS02/03/130300664.理解できなくて当然。@k@vS02/03/130300665.………だけどね、そこからドミノ倒しみたいにパタパタパタといろんなものが倒れ始めて、…収拾がつかなくなってしまった」
TextENG: ``...You probably can't understand.@k@vS02/03/130300664. I wouldn't expect you to.@k@vS02/03/130300665. ......But, you see, all sorts of things started falling over like dominoes after that... and soon it was too much for me to control.

TextJPN: 「……初めの小さなひとつを倒したあなたに自覚がないのは当然だろうけど、………あなたが元凶なの」
TextENG: ...It only makes sense that you wouldn't be aware of knocking over the first one, since it was so small...... but you're the one who set it up.``

TextJPN: 「……………あんたが『魅音』を泣かさなかったら、……私は起きなくて済んだのにね」
TextENG: ``.......If you hadn't made 'Mion' cry... then I wouldn't have had to wake up.``
``............Is that enough?@k@vS02/03/130300669. For you to die in peace...?``

TextJPN: ………俺の、………あの日の間違いが…………全てを狂わせてしまった……？
TextENG: .......A mistake...... that I'd made on that day........... was what messed everything up......?
``...That... that can't... be, can it...?``

TextJPN: 「………………自覚がないのは当然。@k@vS02/03/130300671.でも、紛れもなく元凶なのは圭ちゃん。@k@vS02/03/130300672.…………あの時、あんたがさりげなく人形を私にあげていたら、………多分こんなことにはならなかったと思う」
TextENG: ``............It only makes sense that you wouldn't be aware of it.@k@vS02/03/130300671. Even so, Kei-chan, you are without a doubt the cause.@k@vS02/03/130300672. .........If you had nonchalantly given me the doll that day...... then I don't think this would have happened.``

TextJPN: ………その時、……あ、…と声を上げそうになる……。
TextENG: ......I wanted to say 'ah,' like I'd just... remembered something... as I recalled that day...

TextJPN: …俺はそのことをレナに教えられて……謝ったつもりでいた。
TextENG: ...Rena had told me about that... and I thought I had apologized.

TextJPN: ……でも、俺が謝ったのは魅音じゃない。@kあれは…詩音だった。
TextENG: ...I didn't apologize to Mion, though.@k It had been... Shion.

TextJPN: ……つまり、……何てこと…。
TextENG: ...In other words... Oh, god...

TextJPN: ……俺は………今日まで……魅音に一言も謝っていなかったのだ……。
TextENG: ...I hadn't... said a single word of apology... to Mion...

TextJPN: 俺は今日、この家に来て、謝ることがあると言っておきながら……、このことを一言も謝らなかった。
TextENG: Today, I came to this house, saying I had something to apologize for... but I never said a word of apology about this.

TextJPN: …思えば、…祭具殿に入ったことを謝った時、…魅音が落胆したような寂しさをみせていたように思う。
TextENG: ...Come to think of it... when I apologized for going into the ritual storehouse... Mion looked a little bit lonely, like she was disappointed.

TextJPN: ……どうして今頃…俺は気付くんだ……！
TextENG: ...Why didn't I... realize that until just now...?!

TextJPN: あの時はレナに教えられ、…今度は本人に、…いや、…鬼に教えられ…。
TextENG: Rena told me at the time... and now she, herself... no... the demon was telling me...

TextJPN: ……俺って言う鈍感野郎は…いっぺん死ななきゃ…治らないっていうのか……！！！
TextENG: ...Is the only way for a dense idiot like me... to be cured... to die altogether...?!?!

TextJPN: ………その時、……あ、…と声を上げそうになる……。
TextENG: ......I wanted to say 'ah,' like I'd just... remembered something... as I recalled that day...

TextJPN: 俺は、……園崎家の『次期頭首』としての魅音を恐れ、その重圧と@bかしゃく.@<呵責@>におびえるだけだったが、……俺の『仲間』としての魅音の苦悩を、今まで考えたことがあっただろうか？
TextENG: I... was afraid of ``Mion, future head of the Sonozaki family``, frightened by the pressure and guilt... But did I ever think of the suffering of ``Mion, my friend``?

TextJPN: 村の掟を破って、不可侵であった神聖な場所を汚され。
TextENG: We broke the village code and defiled a sacred place.

TextJPN: ……そのために、……信頼していたはずの仲間に罰を下さなくてはならないと知ったとき、……魅音はどれだけ苦しみ、悩んだことだろう……？
TextENG: ...Just imagine... the pain Mion must've felt when she learned she has to punish her friends that she had trusted... How conflicted she must've felt...

TextJPN: …………思えば、あの時だって、そうだ。
TextENG: ......The same was true back then too, if you think about it.

TextJPN: 人形をあげようとしても、……魅音は、受け取らなかった。
TextENG: Even though I tried giving her the doll... Mion wouldn't take it.

TextJPN: いや、……今ならわかる。受け取れなかったんだ。
TextENG: Or no... She *couldn't* take it.

TextJPN: あの時は、単純に照れ隠しだと思っていたけど、……魅音は女の子としての自分と、村の『代表』としての自分が葛藤して、せめぎあい、そして悩んだ末に、……断ったんだろう。
TextENG: In that moment, I thought she was simply hiding her embarrassment... but I think she was struggling between her identity as a girl and that as representative of the village. And after much internal conflict... she said no.

TextJPN: 『私』を押し殺してでも、『公』を立てて生きる。
TextENG: She had to preserve her public image, even at the cost of her own individuality.

TextJPN: それが、どれだけつらく、……そして、悲しいものであるか、俺なんかに理解できるはずもない。
TextENG: There's no way I could understand how painful and sad that is...

TextJPN: まして、……仲間を裁くなんて残酷な使命を果たすためには、……感情を殺すだけじゃ、正気を保てるわけがなくて、…………だから、心を鬼に売り渡すしか、……選ぶ道は残されてないじゃないか…………！
TextENG: But more than that... when forced to carry out your duty of judging your friends...... it's not enough to simply stifle your own emotions if you want to stay sane...... That's why... she had no other option than to sell her soul to the demons......!

TextJPN: そんな過酷、……いや、残酷に俺の大事な仲間を、追い詰めてしまっていたなんて……！　なんて、俺は馬鹿で、恥知らずで、……情けない男なんだろう……ッ！！
TextENG: I can't believe I've been so harsh...... so cruel, in hunting down my dearest companion......! What a stupid, shameless...... and pathetic man I am!

TextJPN: もう…あふれ出す熱い涙をこらえることなんか出来なかった。
TextENG: I could no longer... hold back the hot tears from pouring out of me.

TextJPN: ただただ、…ぼろぼろと涙を流し、……涙の味を、…後悔の味を…淡々と噛み締めるしかなかった…。
TextENG: I simply... just cried and cried...... and reflected indifferently... on the taste of my tears... on the taste of regret...

TextJPN: 「……じゃあそろそろいい？@k@vS02/03/130300674.　この拷問はね、とってもシンプル。@k@vS02/03/130300675.これから何をされるか、ニブチンなあんたでも……分かるよね？」
TextENG: ``...Can I start now, then?@k@vS02/03/130300674. This method of torture is very simple.``

TextJPN: 魅音が釘の先端を俺の、左手の小指に当てる。
TextENG: Mion pressed the tip of a nail to my left pinky finger.

TextJPN: 「…………他の人を相手にする時には何のためらいもなかったけど。@k@vS02/03/130300683.……なぜかあんたにはためらいがあるよ」
TextENG: ``............I didn't hesitate at all when I was torturing the others.@k@vS02/03/130300683. ...Why do I hesitate now?``

TextJPN: 「………………………………それで魅音の鬼が治まるなら…、」
TextENG: ``............If this will satisfy your demon, Mion...``

TextJPN: それで魅音の鬼が治まるなら、気の済むようにやってくれ…。
TextENG: If it will sate the demon, then do to me what you will...

TextJPN: 「……………あんた、……本気で言ってるの…？」
「……俺が傷つけた魅音の痛みに比べれば…こんなの大したことないんだろ？」
TextENG: ``...Compared to how much I hurt Mion... this is nothing, right?``

TextJPN: 「……気の済むようにするといい。@k@vS02/01/130101152.……そのかわり、…二つ約束しろ」
TextENG: ``...Do as much as you want.@k@vS02/01/130101152. ...In exchange... promise me two things.``

TextJPN: 魅音は無言。@k…だが、…俺の言葉を待ってくれた。
TextENG: Mion was silent.@k ...She did, however... wait for me to speak.

TextJPN: 「…………俺を気が済むまで痛めつけたら、……詩音は許してやれ。@k@vS02/01/130101154.……祭具殿に忍び込んだ罪には、それで充分見合う仕打ちをしたはずだ」
TextENG: ``..........After you're satisfied with causing me pain... forgive Shion.@k@vS02/01/130101154. ...She's been punished enough to make up for her crime of sneaking into the storehouse, hasn't she?``

TextJPN: 「あんた、………この期に及んで…自分より詩音の心配ができるわけ…？」
TextENG: ``You...... After all this... you can still worry about Shion more than yourself...?``

TextJPN: 「…もう一つは、……気が済んだら、…もうお前は消えろ。@k@vS02/01/130101156.………その体を、……魅音に返してやってくれ。@k@vS02/01/130101157.…………………それだけだ」
TextENG: ``...The other thing... is that when you've had your fill... you disappear.@k@vS02/01/130101156. ......Give that body... back to Mion.@k@vS02/01/130101157. ............That's all.``

TextJPN: 「……………。@k@vS02/03/130300688.……………あんたって人には、……命乞いをするとか、そういう考えは思い浮かばないの？」
TextENG: ``............@k@vS02/03/130300688. ............You know, you're... Are you not even considering possibly begging for your life or anything?``

TextJPN: 「…………約束、二つじゃなくて三つにしていいか。@k@vS02/01/130101159.…三つ目は、俺を殺すなにしてくれ」
TextENG: ``.........Can I ask you to promise three things instead of two?@k@vS02/01/130101159. ...The third is to leave me alive.``

TextJPN: 「…あははははは。@k@vS02/03/130300690.最初に二つって言ったでしょ。@k@vS02/03/130300691.…だからもう駄目」
TextENG: ``...Ahahahahaha.@k@vS02/03/130300690. You said two in the beginning, didn't you?@k@vS02/03/130300691. ...So you can't have any more.``

TextJPN: 「……………そいつぁ残念……」
こんな…普通じゃない状況下で、…俺と魅音は二人して、…つまらない冗談を笑い合うように…穏やかに笑い合った…。
TextENG: In... such an abnormal situation... Mion and I laughed quietly together... as if sharing in a stupid joke...

TextJPN: 「……多分、私は約束を守らないよ？@k@vS02/03/130300693.　鬼だから」
TextENG: ``...I probably won't keep these promises, understand?@k@vS02/03/130300693. I'm a demon, after all.``

TextJPN: 「その時は仕方がないさ…」
TextENG: ``I guess there's nothing I can do, then...``

TextJPN: ………歯医者で痛みに耐える時、両手をぐっと握ってこらえたのを思い出す。
TextENG: ......I recalled tightening my hands into fists when enduring the pain at the dentist's office.

TextJPN: …だが、今は指先まで開かれてしまったので握ることもかなわない。
TextENG: ...Right now, though, they were opened all the way to my fingertips, so I couldn't even grip them.

TextJPN: …だから代わりに両足の指をぐっと握った。
TextENG: ...So instead, I tightened my toes.

TextJPN: …さぁ……やれ。
TextENG: ...Okay... do it.

TextJPN: 覚悟はもう終わっていた。
TextENG: I've prepared myself already.

TextJPN: だから。@k…こうしていつまでも釘を打たれない方がかえって怖かった。
TextENG: So do it.@k ...You waiting like this to hammer the nails in is scarier.

TextJPN: …その覚悟が挫けてしまいそうで…。
TextENG: ...It's going to diminish my readiness, after all...

TextJPN: 魅音は金槌を置くと、俺の頬を……やさしく撫でた。
TextENG: Mion put down the hammer... and gently stroked my cheek.

TextJPN: 「……圭ちゃん。@k@vS02/03/130300695.今の、……三つ目の願いだけは、聞いてもいいよ」
TextENG: ``...Kei-chan.@k@vS02/03/130300695. I'll... agree to just the third thing, okay?``

TextJPN: 三つ目の願い。
TextENG: My third wish.

TextJPN: ……俺を助けてくれ。@k………を、聞いてもいいって…？
TextENG: ...To save me.@k ........She'll agree to it...?

TextJPN: 「一つ目の願い。@k@vS02/03/130300697.詩音を救うこと。@k@vS02/03/130300698.…これはもう無理。@k@vS02/03/130300699.……詩音は鬼が殺してしまう。@k@vS02/03/130300700.…それはもう決められたことだから止められない。@k@vS02/03/130300701.だから諦めて」
TextENG: ``Your first wish.@k@vS02/03/130300697. To save Shion.@k@vS02/03/130300698. ...That's long done for.@k@vS02/03/130300699. ...The demon will kill her.@k@vS02/03/130300700. ...It's already been decided, so I can't stop it.@k@vS02/03/130300701. So give up on that.``

TextJPN: 華奢な指が…頬から…顎にかかる。
TextENG: Her delicate fingers... slid from my cheek... to my chin.

TextJPN: 「そして二つ目の願い。@k@vS02/03/130300703.この体を魅音に返すこと。@k@vS02/03/130300704.…これももう無理。@k@vS02/03/130300705.……今日を境に魅音が戻ってくることはもうない。@k@vS02/03/130300706.……今日以降、もし私の姿があったとしても、それは姿だけ。@k@vS02/03/130300707.…私の姿をした鬼だから」
TextENG: ``As for your second wish.@k@vS02/03/130300703. To give this body back to Mion.@k@vS02/03/130300704. ...That won't happen either.@k@vS02/03/130300705. ...After today, Mion will never come back.@k@vS02/03/130300706. ......From today on, even if my body is here, it will be just a body...@k@vS02/03/130300707. ...because the oni has taken it over.``

TextJPN: 「…………そんなことはない。@k@vS02/01/130101164.……魅音は…魅音だ…！@k@vS02/01/130101165.　もう戻ってこないなんて…悲しいことを言うな…！」
TextENG: ``.........That isn't true.@k@vS02/01/130101164. ...Mion is... Mion...!@k@vS02/01/130101165. Don't say such sad things... like that she won't ever come back...!``
``............Can you hear it?@k@vS02/03/130300709. That sound.``

TextJPN: 魅音が軽く目を閉じ、耳を澄ます…。
TextENG: Mion gently closed her eyes and listened...

TextJPN: …それは確かに俺にも聞こえた。
TextENG: ...I definitely heard it as well.

TextJPN: …ドォォ…ン…。@k………ドォォン…。
一定の間隔で繰り返される鈍い音。@k……振動を伴う重い音。
TextENG: It was a dull noise that repeated at fixed intervals.@k ...A low noise accompanied by vibrations.

TextJPN: この地下祭具殿の鉄扉に大勢が体当たりをしているのだ…。
TextENG: A lot of people were ramming the iron doors to this underground ritual storehouse...

TextJPN: 「帰りが遅いから、レナが大石を呼んだんでしょ。@k@vS02/03/130300711.………あのぼやーっとした感じの子が、こんなに頭が回るのだけは計算外だったな」
TextENG: ``You're late, so Rena probably called Ooishi.@k@vS02/03/130300711. ......That spaced-out girl being so quick-thinking was the one thing I didn't anticipate.``

TextJPN: 「………………それについては同感だよ」
TextENG: ``............I'll agree with you there.``

TextJPN: 魅音はしてやられたようにニヤっと笑うと、ポケットから電気髭剃りのようなものを取り出す。
TextENG: Mion grinned like she'd been outwitted, then took something that looked like an electric razor out of her pocket.

TextJPN: ……スイッチを押すと青白い火花が『バチバチ！』と散った。
TextENG: ...When she pressed the switch, pale blue sparks flew out with a snapping noise.

TextJPN: 「…………見たことないでしょ。@k@vS02/03/130300713.本物のスタンガンだよ。@k@vS02/03/130300714.…かなり出力が上げられるようになってるけどね」
TextENG: ``......You've probably never seen one before, right?@k@vS02/03/130300713. It's a real stun gun.@k@vS02/03/130300714. ...It's illegal, and its output has been increased quite a bit.``

TextJPN: 「…さっき、俺に喰らわせたのはそれか。@k@vS02/01/130101168.………子供の玩具には向かねぇぞ」
TextENG: ``...Was that what you hit me with before?@k@vS02/01/130101168. ......That's not a toy children should be playing with, you know.``

TextJPN: スタンガンを俺に当てるつもりらしい。
TextENG: She seemed to want to use the stun gun on me.

TextJPN: …身動きできない俺の首元に、その冷たい塊を押し付ける。
TextENG: ...Unable to move, I felt her press the cool lump of metal to my neck.

TextJPN: ドォォ…ン！
TextENG: Slaaa...aaam!

TextJPN: 最初の大扉を破ったらしい轟音が聞こえてくる。
TextENG: I heard a roar, as though they'd broken down the first, large door.

TextJPN: 通路は多少入り組んでいるけど、…この秘密部屋の扉以外に、もう遮るものはない。
TextENG: The halls were a bit complex... but aside from the door to this very torture chamber, there was nothing in their way.

TextJPN: 「……殺さないけど、しばらく圭ちゃんにはお休みしててもらうね。@k@vS02/03/130300718.すぐに大石が来てくれるから。@k@vS02/03/130300719.ちょっとの我慢」
TextENG: ``...I won't kill you, but I will have you go to sleep for a bit, Kei-chan.@k@vS02/03/130300718. Ooishi will be here soon.@k@vS02/03/130300719. This will only hurt a bit.``

TextJPN: ……さっきと同じ刺激がもう一度か…。
TextENG: ...Feeling the same shock as before...

TextJPN: 歯を食いしばったってどうにもならないだろうが、…ぐっと食いしばる。
TextENG: Gritting my teeth wasn't going to help much... but I clenched them tightly anyway.

TextJPN: だが、釘を打とうとした時と同じ様に、少しの躊躇があった。
TextENG: However, just as she did when she was about to hammer the nails in, she hesitated a little.

TextJPN: ……ぐっと綴じていたまぶたを少しだけ開ける…。
TextENG: ...I cracked open my tightly closed eyelids...
``............I'm sorry...@k@vS02/03/130300721. for disgracing Mion.``

TextJPN: 「………ここに入る前に約束した。@k@vS02/01/130101170.何があっても、俺の中の魅音は変わらない」
TextENG: ``......I made a promise before coming in here.@k@vS02/01/130101170. Whatever happens, the Mion inside my heart won't change.``

TextJPN: 「…………………でも忘れて。@k@vS02/03/130300723.今日以降、もしも私を見かけても、…近寄らないでね。@k@vS02/03/130300724.……それは私の屍に取り憑いた…鬼なんだから」
TextENG: ``............Look, forget about that.@k@vS02/03/130300723. If you ever see me after today... don't come near me.@k@vS02/03/130300724. ...By then, it will be the demon... that inherited my corpse.``

TextJPN: 何を言ってるんだよ。@k…そう言おうとした瞬間、…さっきよりもはるかに強い光が瞬いて……テレビのスイッチが切れるように、…俺の意識を真っ暗にしてしまった…。
TextENG: What are you talking about?@k ...Just as I tried to say that... a much stronger light than before shined... and like a television being switched off... my consciousness went black...
